Hi there! ğŸ‘‹  
Ordering food on Zomato is quick and easy. Hereâ€™s a simple stepâ€‘byâ€‘step guide to help you get your favorite meal delivered to your doorstep:

1. **Download & Open the App (or Visit the Website)**
   - If you havenâ€™t already, download the Zomato app from the App Store (iOS) or Google Play (Android).  
   - Alternatively, you can use the web version at [zomato.com](https://www.zomato.com/).

2. **Create or Log In to Your Account**
   - Sign up with your email, phone number, or social media account.  
   - If you already have an account, just log in.

3. **Enter Your Delivery Address**
   - Add your current location or the address where youâ€™d like the food delivered.  
   - Zomato will show you restaurants that deliver to that area.

4. **Browse Restaurants & Menus**
   - Use the search bar to find a specific restaurant or cuisine.  
   - You can also filter by â€œDeliveryâ€, â€œTakeawayâ€, â€œRatingâ€, â€œPriceâ€, etc.

5. **Select Your Items**
   - Tap on a restaurant, then browse the menu.  
   - Add items to your cart by tapping the â€œ+â€ or â€œAddâ€ button.  
   - You can customize dishes (e.g., extra cheese, no onions) if the option is available.

6. **Review Your Cart**
   - Tap the cart icon to see all selected items, quantities, and the total cost.  
   - Edit quantities or remove items if needed.

7. **Proceed to Checkout**
   - Tap â€œPlace Orderâ€ or â€œCheckoutâ€.  
   - Confirm your delivery address and any special instructions (e.g., â€œRing the doorbellâ€).

8. **Choose a Payment Method**
   - Zomato accepts various payment options: credit/debit cards, net banking, UPI, wallets (Paytm, Google Pay, etc.), and sometimes cash on delivery.  
   - Select your preferred method and complete the payment.

9. **Track Your Order**
   - Once the order is confirmed, youâ€™ll see a live status: â€œOrder Receivedâ€, â€œPreparingâ€, â€œOut for Deliveryâ€, etc.  
   - You can also get realâ€‘time updates via the app or SMS/email notifications.

10. **Enjoy Your Meal!**
    - When the delivery person arrives, doubleâ€‘check the order and enjoy your food.

### Quick Tips
- **Save Favorites**: If you love a particular restaurant, add it to your favorites for faster ordering next time.  
- **Use Promo Codes**: Look for discount codes or â€œZomato Goldâ€ offers to save on your order.  
- **Contact Support**: If you run into any issues, tap the â€œHelpâ€ or â€œSupportâ€ section in the app for assistance.

Thatâ€™s it! If you have any more questionsâ€”whether itâ€™s about payment options, delivery times, or anything elseâ€”just let me know. Happy ordering! ğŸ”ğŸ•ğŸ¥—

Register online

Attend counseling | > **Tip:** Always check the specific programâ€™s admission page on the universityâ€™s official website for the most accurate dates and requirements. --- ## 3ï¸âƒ£ Eligibility Criteria (General) | Course | Minimum Academic Qualification | Entrance Exam | Other Requirements | |--------|--------------------------------|---------------|--------------------| | **B.Tech** | 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Maths (â‰¥ 50% or 60% for SC/ST) | JEE Main (or university test) | None | | **B.Arch** | 10+2 with Maths (â‰¥ 50%) | JEE Main (or university test) | None | | **B.Des** | 10+2 with Maths (â‰¥ 50%) | NATA (or university test) | None | | **B.Pharm** | 10+2 with Chemistry (â‰¥ 50%) | NEET (or university test) | None | | **MBA** | Graduate with 50% (or 55% for SC/ST) | XAT/GMAT/Management Aptitude | None | | **M.Tech** | B.Tech/B.E. with 60% (or 55% for SC/ST) | GATE | None | | **M.Pharm** | B.Pharm with 60% (or 55% for SC/ST) | NEET | None | | **LLM** | LLB with 50% | LSAT (or university test) | None | | **PhD** | Masterâ€™s with 55% | Entrance test or research proposal | None | > **Note:** Some courses may have additional criteria (e.g., minimum age, specific subject combinations). Always verify on the official site. --- ## 4ï¸âƒ£ Required Documents | Document | Format | Notes | |----------|--------|-------| | **Application Form** | Completed online | Save confirmation | | **Academic Transcripts** | Original + photocopies | Certified by the board/university | | **Entrance Exam Scorecard** | Original + photocopy | Valid for 2 years | | **Passportâ€‘size Photographs** | 2 recent photos | As per university guidelines | | **Identity Proof** | Aadhar, PAN, Passport | Original + photocopy | | **Character Certificate** | For PG/PhD | From a recognized authority | | **Research Proposal** | (PhD only) | Detailed outline of research | | **Fee Receipt** | Proof of payment | Keep for future reference | > **Tip:** Keep digital copies (PDF) of all documents for quick uploads. --- ## 5ï¸âƒ£ Application Steps (Online) 1. **Create an Account** - Visit the official Marwadi University admission portal. - Register
